actions.name: Ananya A.
actions.message: Greetings Perkinites. You have retrieved the Quesadilla for me, but I have a mission for you once more.

actions.name: Ananya A.
actions.message: Recent reports show that several freshmen have been sent to Health Services from brutality after going to the Ratty.

actions.name: Ananya A.
actions.message: I do not know if this is because of the recent attacks from drunken frat people, or if it because of the recent hellspawn residing within the Ratty.

actions.name: Ananya A.
actions.message: Whatever it is, you must liberate the Ratty before it is too late. I am still on meal plan, and I fear the V-Dub is TOO far for me.

actions.name: Ananya A.
actions.message: Also I think JP went missing. Maybe he's here.

actions.name: Ananya A.
actions.message: Failure to complete this mission will bring forth MY WRATH.
